homePage.tagline1: The world is built on ideas.
homePage.tagline2: We're shaping the world, one idea at a time.

solutions.title: SOLUTIONS
solutions.solutionsTitle: Building the Future of Türkiye, One Landmark at a Time
solutions.solutionsDescription: At GKS Yapı, we don't just build structures—we shape modern, sustainable, and high-quality living spaces that redefine city life. As a trusted leader in İstanbul's construction and real estate sector, we are committed to innovation, excellence, and long-term value for homeowners and investors alike.

timeline.title: Company Founded
timeline.description: GKS YAPI was established with a vision to transform urban landscapes

timeline.title: First Major Project
timeline.description: Completed our first landmark residential tower in Istanbul

timeline.title: International Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded operations into European and Middle Eastern markets

timeline.title: Sustainability Initiative
timeline.description: Launched eco-friendly building practices across all projects

timeline.title: Design Excellence Award
timeline.description: Received international recognition for architectural innovation

timeline.title: Future Vision
timeline.description: Pioneering smart building technology integration in all new developments

timeline.title: 10th Anniversary Milestone
timeline.description: Celebrated a decade of excellence with the launch of our most ambitious project yet

timeline.title: Green Building Certification
timeline.description: Achieved LEED Gold certification for our commitment to sustainable construction

timeline.title: Corporate Headquarters
timeline.description: Moved into our new state-of-the-art corporate headquarters in downtown Istanbul

timeline.title: Community Initiative
timeline.description: Launched the GKS YAPI Foundation to support local community development projects

timeline.title: First Residential Development
timeline.description: Completed our first boutique residential project featuring 50 luxury apartments

timeline.title: Technology Integration
timeline.description: Implemented cutting-edge BIM technology across all design and construction processes

jobListings.title: Construction Manager
jobListings.description: Lead and oversee construction projects from inception to completion. Manage timelines, budgets, and team coordination.

jobListings.title: Architectural Designer
jobListings.description: Create innovative architectural designs for residential and commercial properties. Collaborate with clients and contractors.

jobListings.title: Project Engineer
jobListings.description: Manage technical aspects of construction projects. Ensure compliance with building codes and safety regulations.

jobListings.title: Real Estate Analyst
jobListings.description: Analyze market trends, property valuations, and investment opportunities. Prepare detailed financial reports and forecasts.

jobListings.title: Interior Designer
jobListings.description: Design and coordinate interior spaces for residential and commercial properties. Work with clients to realize their vision.
